name: Egg Drop (itch)
description:
-- Intro --

Big life announcements are tough. You want it to be an expression of who you are. Something unique. With much consultation from my wife, we decided on this little game. It was incredibly fun to make and I'm very proud of how it turned out. We hope you enjoy!

-- Controls --

On a keyboard use the left and right keys. If you have a touch screen tap for a the on screen controls to pop up.

-- Versions --

1.0.1

* Shrunk the net hitbox.

1.0

* Initial release
